subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After the Mets acquired Cespedes, his offensive influence was obvious and immediate. But Cespedes also does things that his teammates and coaches have never seen; when he bats or fields or runs, they make sure to watch.
snippet: After the Mets acquired Cespedes, his offensive influence was obvious and immediate. But Cespedes also does things that his teammates and coaches have never seen; when he bats or fields or runs, they make sure to watch.
